sentences: Jason John Bonham (born 15 July 1966) is an English drummer.
He is the son of Led Zeppelin drummer John Bonham.

Since his father's death in September 1980, he has performed with the surviving three members of Led Zeppelin on several occasions, including the Ahmet Ertegun Tribute Concert at O2 arena in London in December 2007.
== Biography and musical career

== Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: Bonham could play drums skillfully at the age of five, and appeared with his father in the film The Song Remains the Same, drumming on a scaled-down kit.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: At 15, he joined his first band, Airrace.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: In 1985, he joined Virginia Wolf, making two albums and touring the US supporting the Firm.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: In 1988, Bonham joined Led Zeppelin guitarist Jimmy Page for his Outrider album and tour.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: In May of the same year, Bonham appeared with the three surviving members of Led Zeppelin for a performance at Atlantic Records 40th Anniversary concert in New York City.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: In 1989, Bonham appeared as a special guest at the Moscow Music Peace Festival, performing the song "Rock and Roll" with many major rock stars of the day.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Early years ===

sentences: That same year, he formed his own band, Bonham, whose Zeppelin-inflected first release The Disregard of Timekeeping had a hit single, "Wait for You" and the music video for the subsequent single "Guilty" did get some play; however, after a lukewarm reception for their 1992 release, Mad Hatter, the band was dissolved, and Bonham concentrated on session work and guest appearances.

sentences: His wedding reception included a jam with Jimmy Page, Robert Plant, and John Paul Jones.

sentences: The Bonhams have two children: a son named Jager and a daughter, Jaz (born 1993).

sentences: Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: In February 2009, Jason Bonham and James Dylan began working together in what would become Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening, a live homage to his late father's band.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: During the autumn of 2010, Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening embarked on their first North American tour and toured worldwide throughout 2011.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: Bonham more recently played drums, along with sisters Ann and Nancy Wilson of the group Heart on vocals and guitar respectively, with successive additions of band, string and horn sections, and choirs (including the Joyce Garrett Youth Choir) for a show-ending performance of "Stairway to Heaven" during the Led Zeppelin tribute at the Kennedy Center Honors hosted by Barack Obama in December 2012 with his late father's band members Robert Plant, Jimmy Page, and John Paul Jones in attendance.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: It was described as a "bring down the house" version.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: In the Summer of 2013, Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening joined forces with the band Heart for "The Heartbreaker Tour" celebrating the music of Led Zeppelin.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: Later that year, he teamed up again with Glenn Hughes to form a new rock band, which became California Breed, adding the guitarist Andrew Watt.
section: == Biography and musical career == | === Jason Bonham's Led Zeppelin Evening and other experiences ===

sentences: In 2014, Bonham joined Sammy Hagar's supergroup Sammy Hagar and the Circle.

sentences: The band featured Led Zeppelin tracks along with songs from Hagar's various career projects, such as Montrose, Van Halen, and Chickenfoot.

sentences: Equipment ==
Drums =
Jason Bonham has endorsed DW Drums.
Prior to this, for many years he played a Ludwig Vistalite drumkit similar to his late father's.
Cymbals ===
Endorses Paiste cymbals
Drumsticks =
Bonham has produced his own line of signature series drumstick with Pro-Mark.
The SD531W is made of American Maple with acorn shaped, wooden tips.
The taper is relatively short and the sticks have considerably large dimensions, being 16.75" (42.5 cm) in length and 0.595" (1.5 cm) in diameter.
The sticks also feature the symbol used by Bonham's father, John Bonham, of the three interlocking rings â€“ they are printed next to Jason's signature on the side of the stick.
Other ===
Bonham endorses Remo drum heads and DW drums & hardware.
He uses DW 9000 Series Double Pedals.
